profile_positions.description:
Systems chemistry; Chemical kinetics; Modelling; 
Complexity in prebiotic evolution (origin of life) and in man-made synthetic, biological and chemical systems.
profile_positions.title: Researcher

company.name: Student Union of Science Faculty, Hebrew University

profile_positions.company: Student Union of Science Faculty, Hebrew University
profile_positions.description:
During the end of `04 and the beginning of `05 I have served as a member in this N.P.O. auditing committee.
This committee duty is to make sure the organization works ethically and according to guidelines.
Additionally, as an auditor, I have brought forward & managed the first democratic elections of board of governors to this newly created N.P.O..
profile_positions.title: Auditor

profile_positions.description:
Implementation of financial software at a pharmaceutical company, as well as support to Microsoft Windows & Office softwares.
Developing local-account management software for a global bank opening a new branch in Israel.
profile_positions.title: Programmer
